docs.lead_paragraph: On the outskirts of Topeka, just a few miles west of the Kansas State Capitol on U.S. Highway 40, is a medical institution that is breaking the popular concept that the finest medical care and research are to be found only in large cities.

headline.main: Noted Psychiatric Center Built by Brothers in Topeka; Menninger Clinic, Founded on Principal of Group Practice, Has World-Wide Appeal

docs.abstract: Dr H A Rusk article on Menninger Clinic for psychiatric treatment and research, Topeka, Kansas
docs.snippet: On the outskirts of Topeka, just a few miles west of the Kansas State Capitol on U.S. Highway 40, is a medical institution that is breaking the popular concept that the finest medical care and research are to be found only in large cities.
